reviews.name: Athira
reviews.comment: Nice

reviews.name: Ashika
reviews.comment: Simply beautiful. Very decent yet elegant piece. The material is slightly thinner than expected but extremely comfortable. 42” usually goes great for me but 43” (XXL) for this piece fits perfectly. Worth every penny.
